InstructionData.Title: SPL - Inlet Outlet Splitter
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: alias Inlet1 d0​ alias Inlet2 d1​ alias Outlet d2​ alias device r0​ alias count r1​ alias occupied r3​ alias inoccu r4​ move device 0​ s Outlet Open 0​ yield​ start:​ ls occupied Outlet 0 Occupied​ blez occupied empty​ s Outlet Open 0​ mod device count 2​ wait:​ ls inoccu dr0 0 Occupied​ blez inoccu go​ s db Setting 1​ yield​ j wait​ go:​ add count count 1​ beq device 0 dev0​ s Inlet1 Lock 1​ s Inlet2 Lock 0​ j open​ dev0:​ s Inlet1 Lock 0​ s Inlet2 Lock 1​ open:​ yield​ s Outlet Open 1​ yield​ s Outlet Open 0​ #yield​ j done​ empty:​ s Outlet Open 0​ done:​ yield​ j start
